DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate safety , tolerability PKs GSK2838232 without Ritonavir , evaluate different formulation GSK2838232 healthy subject . This study evaluate high single RTV boost dos support continue clinical development GSK2838232 clinically relevant dos , subsequently infect HIV dose range phase 2 study . The study conduct 2 part : Part A Part B , study Part A Part B may conduct parallel . Approximately 20 healthy subject enrol study , 8 Part A 12 Part B . Part A double-blind , randomize , placebo-controlled , 4-period , single dose escalation design . Subjects randomized 3:1 receive GSK2838232 placebo . Subjects randomize placebo receive placebo four period . Following completion Period 2 PK assessment 96hr post-dose , subject begin daily dose RTV 100mg total 26 day . Part B randomize , open-label , unbalanced , 3-period , cross-over design ; subject randomize 1:1 sequence . The relative bioavailability single 100mg dos powder bottle ( PIB ) active pharmaceutical ingredient ( API ) GSK2838232 versus PIB spray-dried dispersion ( SDD ) assess . A single dose GSK2838232 co-administered 10th day RTV dosing ; RTV dose continue additional 4 day ( total 14 day ) . Subjects screen visit within 30 day prior first dose follow-up visit 7-14 day last dose .
DOC.brief_title: A Single Dose Pharmacokinetic ( PK ) Safety Study GSK2838232 With Without Ritonavir ( RTV ) Conducted Healthy Subjects

Exclusion Criteria 24Hour Screening Holter : Any symptomatic arrhythmia ( except isolate extra systole ) , Sustained cardiac arrhythmia ( atrial fibrillation flutter , supraventricular tachycardia ( > =10 consecutive beat ) , complete heart block ) . Nonsustained sustain ventricular tachycardia ( define > = 3 consecutive ventricular ectopic beat ) . Any conduction abnormality ( include specific leave right incomplete complete bundle branch block , atrioventricular ( AV ) block [ 2nd degree high ] , WolffParkinsonWhite [ WPW ] syndrome etc. ) . Sinus Pauses > 3 second . 300 supraventricular ectopic beat 24 hour . 250 ventricular ectopic beat 24 hour . Any clinically significant abnormal echocardiogram finding . Abnormal echocardiogram finding discuss Medical Monitor prior enrolment . Exclusion criterion screen ECG ( single repeat allow eligibility determination ) : Heart rate < 45 > 100 beat per minute ( bpm ) ( Males ) ; < 50 > 100 bpm ( female ) ; For Males Females : PR Interval < 120 > 220 msec , QRS duration < 70 > 120 millisecond ( msec ) ; QTc interval ( Fridericia 's ) > 450 msec . Notes : A heart rate 100 110 bpm rechecked ECG vitals within 30 minute verify eligibility . Evidence previous myocardial infarction ( Does include ST segment change associate repolarization ) . Any conduction abnormality ( include specific leave right complete bundle branch block , AV block [ 2nd degree high ] , WPW syndrome ) . Sinus Pauses > 3 second . Any significant arrhythmia , opinion principal investigator GlaxoSmithKline medical monitor , interfere safety individual subject .
